description.en: Lady Carinne is in danger of being sold off in a political marriage, but the arrangement falls through when she spends a night with a mysterious stranger, willingly conceiving his child. Her spiteful father locks her away as punishment for years, until one day - another suitor steps forward, offering to marry Carinne and take her child in. When she arrives at his castle, however, she realizes he is someone she has met before…
description.es: Karinne, la hija del vizconde de Tyrian, está a punto de ser vendida como una de las concubinas del lujurioso conde Dupo. Después de acostarse con un misterioso apuesto extraño, Karinne da a luz a su hijo… ¡Todo de acuerdo al plan! Después de considerar a su hija inútil, la vende al Gran Ducado. Al perder la voluntad de vivir, avanza solo para reunirse con el hombre con el que pasó esa fatídica noche, el Gran Duque.
description.pt-br: Lady Carinne corre o risco de ser vendida em um casamento político, mas esse plano acaba sendo arruinado quando ela passa uma noite com um estranho misterioso, concebendo voluntariamente seu filho. Seu pai rancoroso a tranca como castigo por anos, até que um dia  outro pretendente aparece, oferecendo-se para casar com Carinne e acolher seu filho. No entanto, quando ela chega ao seu castelo, ela percebe que ele é alguém que já conheceu antes...

description.en:
Romeo Montague, a boy thrown into the attic with disgust after an accident five years ago. Although the world knew him as a boy unable to move due to a horrid afflicted illness, he lives a happy and fruitful life as a hermit in the attic. Only his cousin, Benvolio, and the housekeeper, Miriam, knows the truth.   
  
But his peace breaks when Miriam's brother, Abram, enters the mansion.  
  
"I'll get you out of this room on your own feet!"   
  
"You don't need to make such promise."  
  
Romeo begins to solve Abram's various troubles with a single thought and determination to preserve his peace in the attic.   
  
Meanwhile, an unexpected adversary appears in front of him half-heartedly.

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

Love and be healed by the unseen side of Madoka and her sisters, and you will surely join their veranda too.

description.en:
Sleeping with the enemy... literally.
After Duke Louison is given a second chance at life, he sets out to save the people he had so terribly failed by surrendering himself to the enemy. Yet little does he know that crossing paths with an enemy knight — the noble-hating Carlton — would become so... intimate. Things are about to get messy!

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.en: I Became the Villain's Contract Family

description.en:
Sirens… a name derived from an ancient creature, used to describe those who could charm, lure, control, and heal others by singing. Years ago, a siren named Sophia was kidnapped by Count Cortez as his prized siren, and a girl named Aria was born soon after as their daughter. Subjected to live the life of a siren, Aria had experienced, seen, and heard many horrific things. Others would do anything to hear her sing, to the point of insanity. The emperor, who grew obsessed with her, broke her legs and locked her in a bird cage deep within the imperial palace to hide her and keep her to himself. Broken beyond repair, Aria resigned herself to death, when suddenly–  
  
The Devil Archduke, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, arrived and whispered, "Should I kill everyone here? If you need me, just call me. Your song will always reach me, wherever you are."  
  
In the end, Aria called the devil, bringing death to all those present, except for herself.  
"Let's fall down to Hell together."  
And with that, Aria breathed her last and died… only to return back to her 10 year old self.  
  
Now that she has a second chance at her life, Aria is determined to change her fate, as well as the cruel future of her savior, Archduke Valentine. She proposes a contract marriage to him, with a divorce planned 10 years later, but he has other plans…
description.ko:
[독점 연재]


아리아는 계약 결혼을 제안했다.
그것도, 악마에게 영혼을 팔았다는 발렌타인의 대공자에게.
자신을 지키고, 그를 지키기 위해서.

[나와 결혼해.]

아리아는 단풍잎 같은 손으로, 쪽지와 함께 혼인 서약서를 내밀었다.

[계약 결혼이니까 10년 뒤에 이혼…….]

그러자 어린 대공자는 쓰고 있던 쪽지를 빼앗아 쫙쫙 찢으며 말했다.

“그래서, 도장은 어디에 찍으면 되지?”

***

“크면 이혼해주겠다고 했잖아.”

어느새 훌쩍 자란 악마 대공이, 그녀의 머리카락 위에 경건하게 입을 맞추며 말했다.

“어른이 되었으니 어른의 계약을 해야지.”


[회귀/ 계약결혼/ 악마 대공자 남주/ 악마 대공 시애비/ 여주가 힘을 숨김/ 폭군들이 다 집착한다/ 치유물/ 성장물/ 초반 육아/ 남주 초반 츤데레→ 이후 광기색기집착다정]

altTitles.en: How to Live as the Enemy Prince

altTitles.es-la: Cómo vivir como el príncipe enemigo

description.en:
Imagine being kin to your sworn enemy.

Killed in battle while defending his country, Bern wakes up in the body of the enemy prince, Kalian, and vows to avenge his people. But between taming an abusive half-brother and surviving his mother's deadly web of intrigue, sweet revenge seems to slip further beyond his grasp at every turn.

---
I could hear the hum of life in my ears. It was hard to breathe… I raised my gaze and stared into the distance. However, my blurred vision could not see anything. The light began to fade. That was my last memory.

When I opened my eyes once again, it was ten years before that last memory took place. And of all the things I could have become, it was from the enemy country that drove Secretia to ruin – I had become Kyris' third prince, Calian.

…..

Bern was the proud Crown Prince of Secretia who fought and died in the war against Kyris. But he woke up ten years into the past – as the timid Third Prince of Kyris, Calian.
description.tr: Son savaşımda mağlup olduktan sonra beni öldüren “düşman ülke”nin prensi olarak yeniden doğdum. Hem de kaderinde erken ölüm olan Callian olarak. Bu, memleketimi kurtarmam için bana verilen bir şanssa… Düşman ülkenin prensi olarak hayatta kalmaktan başka çarem yok!

description.en:
Kirby, the gourmand who will suck up anything, has come to the peaceful land of Pupupu!
"Pleased to eat you! I'm Kirby!"

The slapstick and lively days are about to begin, involving Chilly, who has come to live with Kirby!

title.en: His Majesty Doesn't Want to Be Too Bossy

altTitles.th: บัลลังก์บุปผา

description.en: Like a mascot, this "Emperor" is a woman disguised as a man. The black-hearted Prince Regent has been "taking good care" of her since she was a child. Countless treacherous officials are blocking her way to taking over the throne upon her coming of age. However, if you can't beat that person, then there's always the option of bringing him home to marry!
description.es: Ella es la mascota del Príncipe Regente, es el "Emperador" vestida de hombre. El Regente de corazón negro ha "cuidado bien" de ella desde que era una niña. ¡Pero si no puede vencer a su rival, puede casarse con él!

description.ko:
여성향 연애 시뮬레이션 게임 속 공략 캐릭터에 빙의했다.
1왕자 에드워드에 대한 열등감을 해소하려고 여주를 꼬시는 2왕자로.
난 에드워드에게 살해당하기 싫다.
남의 연애 방해하기도 싫고, 미움받기도 싫다.

“네가 좋아하는 사람이잖아. 난 아무 감정 없어.”
“그래. 좋아하지 않는 게 좋을걸. 네가 그녀와 이어질 일은 없을 테니까.”

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Me Even Though I Reject Your Affection?

altTitles.en: Why Are You So Obsessed With Rejecting Love?
Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?

description.en:
The extra who sacrifices herself for the beloved female lead. Princess Shuelina who is tossed aside by her biologically related father and older brother. Now I’m the main character of this odd situation. In regards to hope, I’m still neglected at this orphanage. Just as I was going to run away before the imperial family found me–  
  
“Did you hear? The House of Grand Duke Vailot came to sponsor an orphan.”  
  
To find a way to live, I threw myself at the villain's family, the Grand Duke’s, and-  
  
“You can do whatever you want. I, as the Grand Duke, will protect you.”  
  
“You’re not an orphan. You’re my younger sister.”  
  
Why do they love me? Just as I made up my mind to live well since I'd already become a lady of the House of Grand Duke Vailot…  
  
"I have searched for you for a long time, my child."  
  
This time my biologically related father, the Emperor loves me. Why are you acting like this? I said, I don't need you guys who wouldn't have listened to what Shuelina had to say. I refuse to accept your love!

altTitles.en: In-Law World Game - Please Save My Husband
The Newlywed Game - How to Save My Husband

description.en:
The ideal husband; a romantic wedding day; a perfect honeymoon… Everything looks as if it's going in the right direction, but instead I'm suddenly living a fantasy?!! Hahahaha, what the hell's going on?!  
  
Every time I fail a quest, I'm thrown right back to the beginning of the mission! Where exactly is this heading!?   
  
To protect my husband, Yeoyun, and stop travelling back in time, I must control this marriage and the in-laws!

Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.ja: Da Renta! : O aspirante a policial Makoto está atualmente pagando suas dívidas na subestação policial de Kabukicho. A movimentada Kabukicho não é nada fácil, especialmente com Ren, que atrai clientes. Makoto luta para se manter profissional diante desse hooligan. Depois de uma noite de bebedeira, ele acorda com uma surpresa agradável, mas confusa, de Ren.

description.en:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last...

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!

---

description.ja:
品行方正、成績トップの同級生美少女・宇佐見。
校内で俺をライバル視して突っかかる彼女には放課後、別の顔がある。
彼女は放課後、ゲーセンで遊び、学校では想像できない無邪気な笑顔を見せるのだ。

俺は宇佐見と仲良くなるため、校内では寄り添い、放課後は一緒に遊ぶ。
それぞれの場所で仲を深め、ついに……ハートフル三角ラブコメ開幕！
description.pt-br:
Usami é uma linda colega de classe, com bons costumes e notas altas. Na escola, ela vê Sakuto como seu rival. Mas quando ele a encontra depois da escola, ele vê um lado diferente dela. Ela estava jogando no fliperama depois das aulas e tinha aquele sorriso inocente que ninguém poderia imaginar nela na escola.

Para se dar bem com ela, ele se aproxima dela na escola e depois joga com ela depois da escola. Cada um deles tem seus lugares onde podem aprofundar seus laços e, finalmente...

Este é o início de uma comédia romântica de triângulo amoroso comovente!

description.en:
After humanity's successful conquest of the Gate, peace has returned once again. However, the powerful psychic abilities of the Espers have become a double-edged sword for humanity, causing them great distress.

A new opportunity arises for Esper "NO.00 Michael," who is facing imminent death.

Adam, a retired soldier who has always struggled with the relationship between Guides and Espers, decides to give Michael, the cause of his leg injury, a second chance.

Adam gives Michael a new name, "Eve," in the hope that he can live a normal life, blending in with humanity.

The two, who have always fought on the front lines, risking their lives, embark on a journey to live a peaceful life in the embrace of humanity, dreaming of an ordinary existence.

title.en: Shitennou Sai Jakudatta Ore. Tensei Shitanode Heionna Seikatsu wo Nozomu

altTitles.ja: 四天王最弱だった俺。転生したので平穏な生活を望む

altTitles.ko: 사천왕 최약이었던 나, 전생했으므로 평온한 생활을 바란다

altTitles.en: I Was the Weakest of the Four Heavenly Kings. Since I Have Reincarnated, I Want to Lead a Peaceful Life

description.en:
Ranga was an ogre. However, he was also a strong ogre. Strong enough that he became one of the four most elite demons in the whole land. And, as with many other stories, his comrades betray him. Upon his death, he reincarnates as a normal human. Now, with all of the knowledge and strength of his former life, what do you think he’ll do with this new opportunity?

a) Live a peaceful life
b) Live a slow life
c) Do whatever he wants


---

**Links:**
- [Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9030ey)

altTitles.ja: 「おかえり、パパ」

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

altTitles.ja: 花よりオオカミ

altTitles.en: The Wolf in the Flower Shop

description.en: Riku Kirishima, a rough-looking high schooler, is a lover of romantic comic books who takes care of his family in place of his late mother. He has a younger brother, who he cares for deeply. One evening, he is suddenly embraced by a man in the park who offers him $300 to spend the night. Riku runs away, but soon learns that the handsome pervert who approached him is actually the guardian of his brother's friend! Enjoy this love story between a handsome florist and a romantic high school tough guy!

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

description.en:
Ciel avoided her brother's obsession and entered into a contract marriage. She was betrayed by her fiance who fell in love with someone else, so she decides to start a new life somewhere else. By chance, Ciel meets her neighbor Otestad, who saves her life, and ends up discovering that he is actually the prince who was fleeing a threat.

A romance about two people who want to fight against destiny and free themselves. Will Ciel be able to fulfill the wish of not having a life stolen again?
description.pt-br: Ciella celebrou um casamento por contrato para evitar a obsessão de seu irmão adotivo. Porém, quando seu noivo, em quem ela pensava poder confiar, a trai porque ela está cega pelo amor, ela monta um novo lar para encontrar sua própria vida legítima. “Você gostaria de pegar aquela maçã?” Enquanto isso, Ciella, que deve sua vida a Otestad, um vizinho que conhece por acaso, percebe que ele é na verdade um príncipe que evitava uma ameaça. Um romance entre duas pessoas que querem escapar do seu destino e lutar contra ele. Será que Ciella conseguirá cumprir sua promessa de não permitir mais que sua vida lhe seja tirada?

altTitles.en: ผูกใจไว้ใกล้ ๆ เธอ

description.en: A red thread exists between a guy and girl that are fated to be together, a bond that can't be seen by the naked eye. Finally, this fated romantic love will begin to open its curtain.

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
  
---

**Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]

title.en: The Duke's Villainous Daughter Is Depressed

altTitles.en: The Melancholy of the Wicked Duke's Lady
The Melancholy of the Evil Duke's Young Lady

description.en: Irene Song had transmigrated inside a novel and became the villainous daughter of a duke. However, the duke, who was unaware of this fact, simply thought she had amnesia and sends her off to marry the second prince of Rennes Empire. Little did she know that the second prince was cursed by an evil wizard and turned him into a dog during the day and could only turn back to a human at night. What’s worse, she even named it “Tofu” after she found it wandering in the Imperial Palace. Who would have known it was her own husband!

altTitles.th: หนีตายเกาะนรกล้านปี

altTitles.ja: エデンの檻

description.en: Akira and his classmates are traveling on a plane when it crashes onto an island inhabited by species thought to have been extinct. The situation becomes increasingly desperate as some of Akira's classmates are eaten alive, while some kill others in desperation. Now Akira and a few other survivors are trying to survive what seems to be a horrible nightmare.

altTitles.es-la: El Retorno De La Constelación Rota

description.en:
After being put on trial, the deity once known as The Divine Twilight is offered a job by Thanatos, king of the underworld! Now, the fallen deity is back on Earth as his former self, Lee Changsun, and is tasked with sealing those trying to invade from beyond. With the promise of a fresh start, Changsun is gathering the gear and skills needed to get the job done, but he's feeling some watchful eyes on him...

Will this Divine Twilight see a new day, or is the sun setting on his second chance?
description.ko:
한낱 인간에서 신의 위치까지 오른 '신들의 황혼'
흉신으로 위명을 떨치다 신좌, 신앙, 신위…… 모든 걸 잃었다.
신성도 끊어졌고, 신력도 사라졌다.

“짐과 같이 일을 좀 해 주었으면 한다.”

그런 그에게 명계의 주인, 타나토스가 손을 내미는데……
그 손을 잡은 '신들의 황혼'은 이제 플레이어 '이창선'으로 다시 살기 시작한다.
자신을 나락으로 떨어트린 신들의 목을 쥐기 위해!

‘돌아왔구나, 정말로.’

altTitles.en: Time Slip of the Fist King

description.en:
In a world where humans enslave other races, the archmage ‘Laefenhart’ is treated as the Demon King by the humans for his sins of helping the other races. 

A group of Heroes came to subdue the Demon King! ‘Laefenhart’ succeeds in causing great damage to the Hero party, but ends up being in danger of being killed by the Fist King, ‘Tesron’…

“Space-Time Return Spell.”

The magic spell cast as a last resort miraculously succeeds and sends ‘Laefenhart’ to the past. However…

I became one of the Heroes, the Fist King, ‘Tesron’, who had the strongest body on the continent?!

The archmage ‘Laefenhart’, with his newly acquired physical strength, changes the world with new powers!

title.en: I Will Seduce the Male Lead for My Older Brother

altTitles.en: Raffine's Plan: Save My Favorite Character
For Older Brother, I Will Seduce the Male Lead
I Will Try to Seduce the Male Lead for My Brother

altTitles.pt-br: Vou seduzir o protagonista pelo meu irmão

altTitles.zh: 为了哥哥，我决心诱惑男主

description.en:
*I'll marry the male lead myself!*

Raffine is in a predicament, and there are three reasons why. One, she's been reincarnated into a super angsty, highly depressing novel. Two, her older brother is destined for death in said novel. And three, the only way to save him is by marrying the male lead. What the hell is going on?!

---
I possessed Raphine, the youngest sister of the second male lead, who had no dreams nor hopes, in an impoverished and obsession filled novel. That was also because he had a crush on the female lead, who married the male lead on a contract, and eventually died.

I can't believe it's such a miserable ending for my favorite character and kind eldest brother. No way!

Raphine decided to brainwash Prince Jerkan, the male lead of the novel, to prevent the female lead's contract marriage.

So that he can think of me when he needs a contract marriage!

"Jerkan! I want to marry you!"
"If you're grateful, you have to marry me next time."
"I need a simple marriage, so I'll get married through a contract."

And when the brainwashing finally succeeded, Raphine cheered inside.

"Okay. Definitely, I'll marry you."

I never imagined what kind of eyes he was had. Yeah, I really didn't know then. I didn't know this would happen.

"Didn't you pester me because you wanted to marry me?"
"Will you run away?"
description.pt-br: Eu possuí Raphine, a irmã mais nova do segundo protagonista masculino, que não tinha sonhos nem esperanças, em um romance empobrecido e cheio de obsessão. Isso também aconteceu porque ele tinha uma queda pela protagonista feminina, que se casou com o protagonista masculino e acabou morrendo. Eu não posso acreditar que é um final tão miserável para meu personagem favorito e irmão mais velho gentil. De jeito nenhum! Raphine decidiu fazer uma lavagem cerebral no Príncipe Zerkan, o protagonista masculino do romance, para evitar o casamento contratual da protagonista feminina. Para que ele possa pensar em mim quando precisar de um casamento por contrato! "Zerkan! Eu quero me casar com você!" "Se você está grato, você tem que se casar comigo na próxima vez." "Eu preciso de um casamento simples, então vou me casar por meio de um contrato." E quando a lavagem cerebral finalmente teve sucesso, Raphine aplaudiu por dentro. "Tudo bem. Definitivamente, eu vou casar com você." Nunca imaginei que tipo de olhos ele tinha. Sim, eu realmente não sabia até então. Eu não sabia que isso iria acontecer. "Você não me importunou porque queria se casar comigo?" "Você vai fugir?"

title.en: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

description.en:
Zheng, the ‘Slaughtering Scythe Ghost’ who finds pleasure in killing.

He happens to have the exact same face as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall, Mok Gyung-Woon…
“Become my body double. That way, I’ll let you out of this prison.”

“Will you give me that opportunity?”
‘Crack-!!!’
He kills the Third Young Master and decides to become the ‘real’ one. Can the fake Mok Gyung-Woon survive as the real one? The serial killer begins his new life as the Third Young Master of the Great Orderly Wooden Sword Hall.

title.en: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者になれなかった俺、スキル「おっぱい矯正」で悩めるあの子を人助け!?

altTitles.en: I Couldn’t Become an Adventurer, so I’ll Help Troubled Girls With My [Breast Correction] Skill!?

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... "breast correction"!?

Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it.

---

Web Novel Raw Link - [https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277)
description.ja:
地球上に突如としてダンジョンが現れてから十余年。優れたスキルを持つ者が冒険者として活躍する世界で、高校生・宮本武が開眼したスキルは……「おっぱい矯正」!? 見たことも聞いたこともない異色のスキルに戸惑う武だったが、それを必要とする女の子は意外にも多そうでーー。

* **宮本 武（みやもと たける）**
高校1年生。密かに冒険者への憧れていたものの、「おっぱい矯正士」という謎のジョブを得てしまう。

* **平良璃夢(たいらりむ)**
武のクラスメイト。武がジョブ「おっぱい矯正士」であることに気づき、あるお願いをする。
 
--- 
 
Chikyū-jō ni totsujotoshite danjon ga arawarete kara jūyonen. Sugureta sukiru o motsu mono ga bōken-sha to shite katsuyaku suru sekai de, kōkōsei miyamoto takeshi ga kaigan shita sukiru wa... "oppai kyōsei"!? Mita koto mo kiita koto mo nai ishoku no sukiru ni tomadou budattaga, sore o hitsuyō to suru on'nanoko wa igainimo ō-sōde ̄̄. 

* **Miyamoto Takeshi**
Kōkō 1-nensei. Hisoka ni bōken-sha e no akogarete ita mono no, "oppai kyōsei-shi" to iu nazo no jobu o ete shimau. 

* **Taira Aki yume**
Take no kurasumeito. Bu ga jobu "oppai kyōsei-shi" dearu koto ni kidzuki, aru onegai o suru.

title.en: By the Grace of the Gods

altTitles.es: El hombre elegido por los dioses

altTitles.en: The Man Picked Up by the Gods

altTitles.id: Seorang pria yang dijemput para dewa.

altTitles.ja: 神達に拾われた男

altTitles.es: El hombre que fue recogido por los dioses

altTitles.fr: L’éleveur de slimes dans un autre monde

description.en:
Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy!

Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research!

Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?!

[MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)
description.es: Ryouma Takuma, es un hombre de 39 años de edad con un pasado misterioso; se encuentra en una extraña habitación desconocida, donde los dioses le dicen que ha muerto y van a enviar su alma a un mundo diferente, al despertar convertido en un niño y en medio de un bosque va descubriendo su afinidad por domesticar monstruos y en particular slimes.
description.fr: Ryouma Takuma, un esclave de bureau de 39 ans, se réveille dans une étrange pièce blanche. Les Dieux lui annoncent qu’il est mort et qu’ils vont envoyer son âme dans un autre monde, où la magie existe. Se réveillant dans le corps d’un jeune garçon avec l’expérience de sa vie passée et de nouvelles habilités données par les Dieux, Ryouma se découvre une affinité avec la capture de monstre, et tout particulièrement avec les slimes! Suivez les aventures de Ryouma et de ses slimes, plus impressionnants qu’il n’y paraît, dans ce nouveau monde!
description.ru: Рёма Такума, 39 летний человек, оказался в странной белой комнате. Боги говорят ему, что он умер и посылают его душу в другой мир, мир где существует магия. Живя в одиночестве 3 года, его геймерская душа просто теряет здравый смысл и начинает сумасшедший путь.

altTitles.ja: 日本国召喚

description.ar: في الشرق العظيم ، تقع قاره عظيمه تسمى رودينوس في يوم ما ، وصل جسم طائر مجهول في المجال الجوي لمقاطعة كوا-توين ، الجسم الطائر المجهول كان معارضا لجو المقاطعة الاعتيادي ، فلم تتقبله المقاطعة ، لكن كان هذا الجسم الطائر مجرد نذير لشيء اكثر صدمة بعيدًا عن البحر الشرقي ، ظهرت فجاه مجموعة من الجزر ، تسمي نفسها دولة اليابان وفقا لهم ، تم نقل أمتهم الى عالم آخر والآن يجدون انفسهم منفصلين عن عالمهم القديم ويجب عليهم البقاء على قيد الحياة في العالم الجديد ، كيف ستتفاعل اليابان مع البلدان الاصليه في العالم الجديد؟ هل سيرحبون بها كصديقه ام كعدو؟ هذه قصه الدوله التي تسمى باليابان التي تغرق في عاصفه فوضويه في العالم
description.en:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

altTitles.ja: オメガトライブ

description.en: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

altTitles.ja: とんがり帽子のアトリエ

description.en:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way she’s never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody “knows” might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems…
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Brave's

description.en:
Oda Akira, a high school student who excels in erasing his presence, was summoned along with his classmates to another world. In this world of sword and magic, Akira and his classmates were asked to become heroes and bring down the demon king. Having a bad feeling about the king and the princess who asked them, Akira uses his special skills to sneak into the king’s library, in hopes of discovering the truth. Whether to help or abandon his classmates who knew nothing, it all depended on Akira.  
  


---
description.fr: Une classe de secondes années est invoquée dans un monde où une guerre se prépare. Le roi demanda aux jeunes protagonistes de subjuguer le roi démon, mais il n'y en aura qu'un seul qui aura la classe de Héros. On leur a annoncé que ceux qui ne le seront pas joueront pourtant un rôle clé dans cette guerre. Mais contre toute attente, l'élève le plus effacé de la classe réalise que ses statistiques sont bien plus élevées que celles du Héros tout en étant un assassin… Que cache le roi aux jeunes invoqués ? Que va faire notre assassin dans cette situation ?
description.it:
Oda Akira, uno studente delle superiori che eccelle nel cancellare la sua presenza, viene evocato con i suoi compagni di classe in un altro mondo.   
In questo mondo di spade e magia, ad Akira e ai suoi compagni viene chiesto di diventare eroi e di abbattere il signore dei demoni.   
Avendo un cattivo presentimento riguardo al re e alla principessa dai quali proviene la richiesta, Akira usa le sue abilità speciali per infiltrarsi di nascosto nella libreria del re, con la speranza di scoprire la verità. Se aiutare o abbandonare i suoi compagni che non ne sapevano niente, dipendeva tutto da Akira.
description.ru: Класс неприметного Акиры Оды в полном составе призывают в другой мир. Новоприбывших ждут редкие способности и королевская просьба одолеть дьявола. Акира не исключение: старшеклассник получает призвание ассасина, стандартное для фантастических новелл. Однако есть проблема. Статы простого «второстепенного персонажа» оказываются на порядок выше, чем у одноклассника, определённого в герои. Что же скрывается за этой странностью и самим призывом? Поиск ответа не будет лёгким.

altTitles.ja: 義理チョコ嫌いの男女

altTitles.en: A Man and a Woman Who Hate Obligatory Chocolates

altTitles.pt-br: Um homem e uma mulher que odeiam chocolates obrigatórios

description.en:
You realize that these aren't just obligatory chocolates, right?

Obligatory chocolate is the kind that you give to people you don't even like, just because it's a Valentine's Day tradition. Aya, a beautiful office lady who is often misunderstood because of her lack of visible emotions, was complaining about it to her boss Takaki, as they walked to the train station together after work. However, Takaki told her, "That's too bad, because I was really looking forward to getting chocolates from Aya, even if it's just obligatory…"

As they parted ways, Aya hands Takaki a box of chocolates. Takaki is confused, because he thought she didn't like giving out obligatory chocolates…

"Senpai, are you really that dumb?"

Winner of the 3rd Toaru Nichijou Manga Award, it's a sweet romantic comedy that will satisfy your heart and your sweet tooth!
description.pt-br:
Você percebe que estes não são apenas chocolates obrigatórios, certo?

Aya, uma bela moça de escritório que costuma ser mal interpretada por causa de sua falta de emoções visíveis, estava reclamando disso com seu chefe Takaki, enquanto caminhavam juntos para a estação de trem depois do trabalho. No entanto, Takaki disse a ela: 

"Isso é uma pena, porque eu realmente estava ansioso para ganhar chocolates de Aya, mesmo que seja apenas obrigatório..."

Ao se despedirem, Aya entrega uma caixa de chocolates a Takaki. Takaki fica confuso, porque pensou que ela não gostava de dar chocolates obrigatórios...

"Senpai, você é realmente tão burro?"

altTitles.ja: 黒の召喚士

description.en:
“If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself.”

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie.

Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on! Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight!

The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history!

See the colorful characters and the thrilling battles come to life in this visual retelling of the light novel series by Doufu Mayoi.

---
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/) (Raw)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

altTitles.ja: 光路郎

description.en: Kojiro is the new English teacher at Sakaue High School. He is a foreigner with blonde hair and blue eyes, he also goes to school by riding his surfboard daily. This is the story of a free-spirited teacher who came across the sea to his mother's homeland.

title.en: Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume: to, Pochi no Daibouken

altTitles.ja: 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ
Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume

altTitles.en: The Eternal Fool's Words of Wisdom: A Pawsitively Fantastic Adventure

altTitles.pt-br: O Princípio de um Filósofo por um eterno idiota "Asley".

altTitles.en: The Principle of a Philosopher by Eternal Fool "Asley"

altTitles.ja: 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ と、ポチの大冒険

description.en:
A couple thousand years of solitude would wear down any young man — that is, anyone except Asley, an eternally youthful and eternally foolish sorcerer. After all, he has man’s best friend... er, familiar, to keep him company.

When his Level 100 canine companion Pochi demands that he get some fresh air for the first time in two centuries, Asley sets out to reintegrate into society and test his magic mettle. His mission? Dropping several unglamorous titles from his repertoire and restoring his good (okay, decent) name.

A brand-new world and fresh adventures await Asley after his many years of hermitage. Perhaps he’ll lend Pochi a hand to place first in the mysterious Familiar Feud. Or maybe he’ll lose all vestiges of dignity and turn tail. Whichever comes first!

No matter what, Asley has great evil to fight, a big world to save, and even a little growing up to do... that is, if he can endure Pochi’s “friendly advice” along the way!
description.ru:
В молодости Азли потерпел неудачу в Волшебной Академии, после чего был высмеян людьми. Тогда бросив академию Азли решил занятся алхимией и случайно сделал эликсир бессмертия. Погрузившись в исследования Азли не заметил как прошло много времени.  
После 5000 лет исследований он стал волшебником, но кое-что он упустил. Люди, которым он хотел отомстить, давно умерли. Потеряв свою цель, Азли решил отправиться в путешествие со своим другом Почи, чтобы посмотреть, как изменился мир спустя 5000 лет. Что же его ждёт впереди?!
description.pt-br: Quando ele era jovem, ele falhou na Academia de Magia e foi menosprezado por outros. No entanto, por acaso, ele descobriu um remédio mitológico, então ele obteve um corpo imortal. Para se vingar das pessoas que zombavam dele, ele começou a pesquisar magia e artefatos mágicos diferentes da academia. Após 5000 anos de pesquisa, ele se tornou um antigo usuário de magia antes de perceber. As pessoas que ele estava procurando vingança se foram a muito tempo; Perdendo seu propósito, Asley foi em uma viagem para ver o mundo depois de 5000 anos com sua familiar Pochi. Com uma virada inesperada de eventos depois de ajudar muitos humanos, ele agora está vivendo na academia de magia. Um homem de 5000 anos com uma jovem aparência Asley, como ele vai viver a juventude da sua segunda vida? - Baseado em um romance/novela

description.pt-br: Um ano após a batalha no santuário. Natsuki Subaru estava passando um tempo tranquilo, mas tudo mudou quando recebeu um convite de um certo mensageiro. O convite para a cidade portuária de Priestella, que era a carta que Anastasia, uma das candidatas à realeza, enviou para Emilia. Rumo à cidade portuária onde o mal se agita, os heróis veteranos se reúnem. A tão esperada adaptação em manga do Arco 5 de Re:Zero começa!

altTitles.ja: 恋する鬼畜島

description.en: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

In a not-too-distant future, there lies a royal city where a tyranny of nobles, greedy for power and self-interest, prevails, using the weakened royal authority as an excuse. Among them, Ray Arisa lives in a shabby bookstore in a corner of a brothel alley, where the lowest class of people resides. He would have been able to take care of himself, but a terrible illness has been following him, and poverty has been his only family for a long time. The only painkiller that spares Ray from the pain is finding a partner at a gay bar for a one-night stand, engaging in sexual pleasure.
One day, after engaging with two large men who were interested in him at the same time, one of them started to infiltrate Ray’s life little by little. Contrary to his straight appearance, a man with promiscuous sex habits approached Ray without hesitation and did him a favor for no known reason. After being sweet-talked by a man who has everything suspicious about him, Ray ended up continuing the relationship with him despite knowing that the man is like a sugar coated poison.
